value:
$WmMPID_忍者シャミア,ch17_34_Shamir_F_Ninja21,Face|Shinon, I could not help noticing that
you, unlike the rest of us, are using
your typical weaponry...$k$p$WmMPID_忍者シノン,ch11_24_Chinon_M_Ninja21,Face|If I'm forced to play dress-up, I'm
not giving up my bow as well.$k$p$WmMPID_忍者イグレーヌ,ch02_23_Igrene_F_Ninja21,Face|I have no problem with it. It's not
every day you get to watch a master
at his craft.$k$pThis may be all fun and games, but
I fully intend to learn as much from
your archery as I'm able.$k$p

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_03,0|$WmMPID_忍者シノン,ch11_24_Chinon_M_Ninja21,Face|Hm. Everything feels off today...
Must be this outfit. Alas, I have
no choice but to wear it for now...$k$p$Sbs150|
